attributes.long-description:
SINE MORA is a horizontal shoot'em up that provides a unique take on challenge, where time is the ultimate factor. Mixing classic shooter sensibilities with contemporary presentation, SINE MORA is a gorgeous shmup that offers a Story Mode that weaves an over-the-top tale and an Arcade Mode that provides deep, satisfying gameplay to challenge fans of the genre. With many ways to manipulate time, SINE MORA features over 60 weapon combinations to complete each beautiful stage that form fits to the player's skills with scaling difficulty. Soundtrack composed by Akira Yamaoka and featuring boss designs by Mahiro Maeda. The full version comes with a PlayStation® exclusive playable character from G.rev’s acclaimed title, Under Defeat.

1 player(s)
Network Features
832KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Dual Analog Sticks
Location Data Acquisition Service

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement and this item's use restrictions.
